issue.title: [Dev][Release] Use archery's changelog generator when creating release notes for the website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The previous changelog generation script has been removed.
